description: The legendary City of Gold, an ancient Shandorian city originally located on Jaya that was blasted into the sky by the Knock Up Stream 400 years ago. The city's buildings were covered entirely in gold and it housed the Golden Bell and a Poneglyph.

geographicDetails.terrain: Ancient ruins with golden architecture, hidden beneath cloud layers

historicalSignificance: Shandora was built by the Shandorians 1100 years ago and served as the guardian city of a Poneglyph. The city fell during the Void Century to unknown invaders while protecting the Poneglyph. 400 years before the current storyline, the entire city was launched into the sky by a Knock Up Stream, where it became the center of the 400-year conflict between the Shandia and Skypieans.
politicalStatus: Ancient ruins, contested territory during Skypiea arc

keyEvents.title: Discovery by Nico Robin
keyEvents.description: Robin discovers Shandora by descending through the cloud layer, revealing the legendary City of Gold.
keyEvents.significance: Confirms the legends of the City of Gold and reveals a major location tied to the True History.

keyEvents.title: Poneglyph Discovery
keyEvents.description: Robin finds the Shandorian Poneglyph and realizes the city fought to protect it.
keyEvents.significance: Connects Shandora to the Void Century and explains why it was destroyed.

culturalDetails.traditions: City built to protect the Poneglyph and preserve ancient knowledge
culturalDetails.religion: Connection to the Golden Bell and ancestral worship

description: The ancient ruins scattered across Upper Yard where Robin explores and encounters Yama. These ruins contain historical monuments and artifacts that Robin seeks to protect.

keyEvents.title: Robin vs Yama Battle
keyEvents.description: Robin encounters Yama in the ruins and battles him while trying to protect the historical monuments.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Robin's dedication to preserving history and her combat abilities.

keyEvents.title: Robin Protects the Ruins
keyEvents.description: Robin uses Veinte Fleur: Calendula to shield the ancient monuments from Yama's attacks.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Robin's commitment to historical preservation.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, currently anchored in Upper Yard. In this episode, it serves as a base for Nami, Conis, Pagaya, and Aisa.

keyEvents.title: Nami Tests Refurbished Waver
keyEvents.description: Nami tests the upgraded Waver around the Going Merry with help from Pagaya, Conis, and Aisa.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the alliance with Skypieans and preparation for upcoming events.

description: The inside of Nola, the giant snake. Luffy is trapped here, mistaking it for a cave while trying to find his way out.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Trapped Inside
keyEvents.description: Luffy continues his attempts to escape from inside Nola while hungry and oblivious to being inside a living creature.
keyEvents.significance: Comedic subplot showing Luffy's persistence and obliviousness.
